chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 Pro is experiencing the following issue:
The SIM card reader is defective. My Orange operator has made numerous adjustments and resets, but still no SIM card detected. A test was done with another SIM card, and the problem persists.
Thank you for your help,

Hello,
My iPhone 12 Pro is having the following issue:
Hello I returned the order 40995754 but without proof of purchase in the package, you have it in the documents on your site ,I'm sorry, and I hope my refund will be made,I later bought another phone.
Best regards
Elisabeth Pereira
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

Please note that this is a return for refund.

Regards,
Suzie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have received the device. We will proceed with the necessary actions soon. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

This is a reminder for the refund.

Regards,
Suzie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the deadline of the refund. The device is currently under processing with out repair team and we will update you if there are any issues.

Regards,
JH

Hi ecomobile,

This is a last reminder for the refund.

Suzie Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Apologies for the delay in the refund. The phone is still being processed and we are unable to confirm if the device is ready for a refund. We would appreciate it if you give us more time to process the phone. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
